title: Python Programming Basics
description: Test your understanding of Python fundamentals

hints.correct: Absolutely right! Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity.
hints.fail: Not quite! Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language.

questions.question: Which of the following is used to create a comment in Python?

hints.correct: Correct! In Python, we use # to create single-line comments.
hints.fail: Try again! Python uses # for comments, not the other symbols.

questions.question: What is the correct way to create a list in Python?

hints.correct: Perfect! Square brackets [] are used to create lists in Python.
hints.fail: Not quite! Lists in Python are created using square brackets [].

questions.question: Which keyword is used to define a function in Python?

hints.correct: Excellent! The 'def' keyword is used to define functions in Python.
hints.fail: Try again! Python uses the 'def' keyword to define functions.
